content.title: Finding Peace (Day 5)
content.author: Charles F. Stanley
content.subtitle: Philippians 4:7
content.text: When you guard your mind, you guard your peace.  When you offer prayers to God with faith and thanksgiving - no matter what trials you face - He assures you inner peace. And when you focus your thinking on what's true, noble, virtuous, lovely, pure, and praiseworthy, you rely upon God with increasing faith and trust.

content.prompt: Does anything from today's verse stand out to you?

references.text: Then you will experience God's peace, which exceeds anything we can understand.  His peace will guard your hearts and minds as you live in Christ Jesus.
And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
